studios.name: Estudio Dharma
studios.description: Estudio Dharma es un espacio dedicado to la práctica del yoga en sus diferentes estilos. Nuestro objetivo es brindar un ambiente cálido y acogedor donde cada persona pueda encontrar su propio camino en el yoga.

studios.name: Yoga Vida
studios.description: Yoga Vida offers dynamic classes for practitioners looking to deepen their practice in a supportive community environment.

studios.name: Peaceful Studio
studios.description: A tranquil space focused on slow, mindful practices that help you connect with your inner self and find peace.

studios.name: Power Flow Yoga
studios.description: Challenge yourself with our powerful vinyasa flows designed to build strength and flexibility.

studios.name: Sunrise Yoga
studios.description: Start your day with our gentle morning classes that focus on alignment and mindful movement.
